column1: Unemployment rate by London borough (2015-18 and 2018-21 Q1)
Note: Data are three year averages based on annual April to March figures. Unemployment rate is the proportion of the working age economically active population.
Data source: Annual Population Survey via NOMIS, ONS
London's Poverty Profile is created by charitable funder Trust for London, and economic and public policy consultancy, WPI Economics
